channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SOLR-15804] Unable to view XML files via the Solr Collection GUI
item.description:
Hi,
Updated our cluster to 8.11.0 in testing this morning and noticed that the “file” explorer is broken when viewing a file.

To recreate:

  • Select a collection
  • Select files
  • Click on an XML file
13:55:58.753 [qtp33233312-2347] ERROR org.apache.solr.handler.RequestHandlerBase - org.apache.solr.common.SolrException: Requested content type 'text/xml;charset=utf-8' is not supported.
org.apache.solr.common.SolrException: Requested content type 'text/xml;charset=utf-8' is not supported.
	at org.apache.solr.handler.admin.ShowFileRequestHandler.getSafeContentType(ShowFileRequestHandler.java:269) ~[solr-core-8.11.0.jar:8.11.0 e912fdd5b632267a9088507a2a6bcbc75108f381 - jpountz - 2021-11-09 14:08:51]
	at org.apache.solr.handler.admin.ShowFileRequestHandler.showFromZooKeeper(ShowFileRequestHandler.java:186) ~[solr-core-8.11.0.jar:8.11.0 e912fdd5b632267a9088507a2a6bcbc75108f381 - jpountz - 2021-11-09 14:08:51]
	at org.apache.solr.handler.admin.ShowFileRequestHandler.handleRequestBody(ShowFileRequestHandler.java:137) ~[solr-core-8.11.0.jar:8.11.0 e912fdd5b632267a9088507a2a6bcbc75108f381 - jpountz - 2021-11-09 14:08:51]

	at org.apache.solr.core.SolrCore.execute(SolrCore.java:2637) ~[solr-core-8.11.0.jar:8.11.0 e912fdd5b632267a9088507a2a6bcbc75108f381 - jpountz - 2021-11-09 14:08:51]
	at org.apache.solr.servlet.HttpSolrCall.execute(HttpSolrCall.java:794) ~[solr-core-8.11.0.jar:8.11.0 e912fdd5b632267a9088507a2a6bcbc75108f381 - jpountz - 2021-11-09 14:08:51]
	at org.apache.solr.servlet.HttpSolrCall.call(HttpSolrCall.java:567) ~[solr-core-8.11.0.jar:8.11.0 e912fdd5b632267a9088507a2a6bcbc75108f381 - jpountz - 2021-11-09 14:08:51]
	at org.apache.solr.servlet.SolrDispatchFilter.doFilter(SolrDispatchFilter.java:427) ~[solr-core-8.11.0.jar:8.11.0 e912fdd5b632267a9088507a2a6bcbc75108f381 - jpountz - 2021-11-09 14:08:51]

	at org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.FilterHolder.doFilter(FilterHolder.java:201) ~[jetty-servlet-9.4.44.v20210927.jar:9.4.44.v20210927]
	at org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.ServletHandler$Chain.doFilter(ServletHandler.java:1601) ~[jetty-servlet-9.4.44.v20210927.jar:9.4.44.v20210927]
	at org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.ServletHandler.doHandle(ServletHandler.java:548) ~[jetty-servlet-9.4.44.v20210927.jar:9.4.44.v20210927]
	at org.eclipse.jetty.server.handler.ScopedHandler.handle(ScopedHandler.java:143) ~[jetty-server-9.4.44.v20210927.jar:9.4.44.v20210927]

item.summary: Unable to view XML files via the Solr Collection GUI

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: A PR is here https://github.com/apache/solr/pull/418

Commit 46d2ad2ca9f200628d905aeab2378a1399ae25bb in solr's branch refs/heads/main from Jan Høydahl
[ https://gitbox.apache.org/repos/asf?p=solr.git;h=46d2ad2 ]

SOLR-15804 Allow content-types with ;charset in ShowFileRequestHandler (#418)

  • Allow content-types with charset in ShowFileRequestHandler
  • Request .html as text/xml, .css as text/plain and .js as application/javascript
  • Highlight css as txt (crashed browser)
  • Set extension to 'xml' for managed-schema instead of 'text/xml'

Commit 4e5b7fd81d2add1acf0ec15539cc2d0453d754dd in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/branch_8x from Jan Høydahl
[ https://gitbox.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=4e5b7fd ]

SOLR-15804 Allow content-types with ;charset in ShowFileRequestHandler (#2612)

  • SOLR-15804 Allow content-types with ;charset in ShowFileRequestHandler
  • Request .html as text/xml, .css as text/plain and .js as application/javascript
  • Highlight css as txt (crashed browser)
  • Set extension to 'xml' for managed-schema instead of 'text/xml'
  • Clean up 8.11.1 changes section, removing 'Build' and 'Other changes'

Cherry pick from 9.x https://github.com/apache/solr/commit/46d2ad2ca9f200628d905aeab2378a1399ae25bb

Commit 04bf333b338cb51530bd3b828d15c5fdcfe4814f in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/branch_8_11 from Jan Høydahl
[ https://gitbox.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=04bf333 ]

SOLR-15804 Allow content-types with ;charset in ShowFileRequestHandler

  • Request .html as text/xml, .css as text/plain and .js as application/javascript
  • Highlight css as txt (crashed browser)
  • Set extension to 'xml' for managed-schema instead of 'text/xml'
  • Clean up 8.11.1 changes section, removing 'Build' and 'Other changes'

Cherry picked from branch_8x 4e5b7fd81d2add1acf0ec15539cc2d0453d754dd
Adding https://github.com/apache/solr/pull/456 (main) to make VelocityWriter work, see PR.

Commit cabf786f09d1305a38684373a88c4e94f53a537c in solr's branch refs/heads/main from Jan Høydahl
[ https://gitbox.apache.org/repos/asf?p=solr.git;h=cabf786 ]

SOLR-15804 Support leading slash for "file" parameter, to mean relative to config dir. Support text/javascript (#456)

Commit 866e62083e672b7af09a2ed16f33827029e02534 in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/branch_8_11 from Jan Høydahl
[ https://gitbox.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=866e620 ]

SOLR-15804 Support leading slash for "file" parameter, to mean relative to config dir. Support text/javascript (#2629)
